events.description: What are you waiting for, come challenge it now, be the first to get 2048!
events.name: 2048 Challenge.

events.description: Defeat the Omega Rugal clones a certain number of times during the event to get Omega Rugal[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Omega Rugal.

events.description: Open Equipment Chest during the event to get various items!
events.name: Open Equipment Chests for Rewards.

events.description: Weapons can be exchanged for "Equipment Frag" during the event, and you can exchange "Equipment Frag" for useful weapons.
events.name: Equipment Fragment Exchange.

events.description: During the event, 50% Off for first Openx10 of Equipment Chest every day! (Daily Reset)
events.name: First x10 Equipment Chest 50% Off.

events.description: Kensou eats Buns during the event. Play the game and claim rewards!
events.name: Mini game-Eat Buns.

events.description: Defeat the Igniz clones a certain number of times during the event to get Igniz[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Igniz.

events.description: During the event, you can get double rewards in Main Campaigns. (Daily Reset)
events.name: Campaign Rewards Doubled.

events.description: Purchase SP a certain number of times during the event to gain extra rewards! (Daily Reset)
events.name: SP on Sale.

events.description: Aid Doll Machine is unlocked! The Aid Souls of Robert 2002 UM, Benimaru 2003, and Adelheid are waiting for you to get!
events.name: Aid Doll Machine.

events.description: During the event, Fighter's Aid Pack is unlocked for limited time! Get it now!
events.name: Aid Pack Exchange.

events.description: During the event, Aid Skill Book is unlocked for limited time! Get it now!
events.name: Aid Skill Book Exchange.

events.description: Recharge 45 Diamonds for 1 hammer (max 10/day). Use 1 hammer and 10 Diamonds to smash eggs.
events.name: Egg Frenzy (Diamond).

events.description: Kula Defense War is unlocked during the event, test your speed and claim great rewards!
events.name: Kula Defense War.

events.description: Mirage Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come and challenge Mirage Challenge stages!
events.name: Mirage Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Train your superpower by charging the crystal ball and get rewards!
events.name: Superpower Drill .

events.description: Accumulate certain ultimate trial points during the event and claim extra rewards! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Rewards for Trial Points.

events.description: A new week begins, and it's time to start work again! Complete tasks and get great rewards!
events.name: Work Benefits.

events.description: During the event, draw a certain number of times in Gene Map Store to get rare items! Don't miss the chance!
events.name: Gene Map Draw Gift.

events.description: Exchange for the fighter fragments you need now, don't miss this rare opportunity!
events.name: Fighter Fragment Exchange.

events.description: Rune Converter is unlocked for limited time. It's up to you to decide your own runes!
events.name: Rune Converter.

events.description: Hot Runes event is unlocked, come get it and increase your power now!
events.name: Hot Runes.

events.description: Come to Shake&Shake, a lot of amazing rewards are waiting for you! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Shake&Shake.

events.description: Spend Diamonds to a specified amount during the event and get awesome rewards!
events.name: Spend for Rewards.

events.description: Female Fighters Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Female Fighters Challenge stages!
events.name: Female Fighters Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Super Gold Scratcher is here, who knows what you may get!
events.name: Super Scratcher.

events.description: Defeat the Kula clones a certain number of times during the event to get Kula[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Kula.

events.description: Welcome to Shermie Adventure. Embark on a fun filled adventure with Shermie and find amazing treasures.
events.name: Shermie Adventure.

events.description: EXP Rush Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge EXP Rush Challenge stages!
events.name: EXP Rush Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Opening hidden safes in Ultimate Trials for double Golds, come get it now! (Only doubled for free tries) (Daily Reset)
events.name: Double Gold in Trial Hidden Safe.

events.description: Get BOSS Coin through the event to exchange for mighty BOSS fighters! What are you waiting for?
events.name: BOSS Exchange.

events.description: During the event, Fighter Weapon Awakening Frag Pack is available for limited time. Get it now!
events.name: Fighter Weapon Awakening Frag Pack Exchange.

events.description: Time-limited Fighter Fashion is on sale! Come and get some new fashion for your fighters!
events.name: Fighter Fashion Sale.

events.description: Mini game - Seal Orochi is unlocked! Come help seal orochi Now!
events.name: Minigame - Seal Orochi.

events.description: Gold Rush challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Gold Rush stages!
events.name: Gold Rush Chance+2.

events.description: Come and eat fruits with Kula to get rewards!
events.name: Kula's Fruits Adventure.

events.description: Defeat the Orochi Leona clones a certain number of times during the event to get Orochi Leona[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Orochi Leona.

events.description: Equipment pack can increase Death Vice to:
events.name: Fighter Equipment Pack (Death Vice).

events.description: Upgrade pack can increase Death Vice to:
events.name: Fighter Upgrade Pack (Death Vice).

events.description: Rare fashion for Death Vice is available during the event.
events.name: Fashion Pack.

events.description: Spend a certain amount of Diamonds to claim amazing rewards including Diamonds and Cuisines!
events.name: Diamonds for Gifts.

events.description: Recharge certain amounts in a single top-up to get valuable rewards!
events.name: Single Top-up for Resources.

events.description: Pop Balloons is unlocked during the event. Hit the balloon accurately to get rich rewards!
events.name: Pop Balloons.

events.description: Defeat the Instinct Iori clones a certain number of times during the event to get Instinct Iori[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Instinct Iori.

events.description: Aircraft Game is here, take your fight into the sky, let's go!
events.name: Mini game-Aircraft.

events.description: Mirage Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come and challenge Mirage Challenge stages!
events.name: Mirage Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Accumulate arena points during the event and claim extra rewards! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Rewards for Arena Points.

events.description: Promotion Gem exchange during the event, come join it!
events.name: Promotion Gem Exchange.

events.description: BOSS Fighter cuisine is available in Mystic store during the event.
events.name: Mystic Store.

events.description: Use Egg Machine during the event, and there is a chance for you to get Death Vice Awaken Weapon Frag, Tome, Badge and other rare items.
events.name: Weapons Egg Machine.

events.description: Kyo's Tower Drop is available during the event. Get rich rewards with your wit!
events.name: Kyo's Tower Drop.

events.description: Double SP for the first 5 purchases during the event! (Daily Reset)
events.name: Double SP for first 5 purchases.

events.description: Tome and Tome material can be exchanged for one another during the event, please take note that each Tome can only be exchanged once, choose carefully!
events.name: Tome Exchange.

events.description: What treasures can you dig up from Ash Secret Garden? Come check it out!
events.name: Ash Secret Garden.

events.description: Female Fighters Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge Female Fighters Challenge stages!
events.name: Female Fighters Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Defeat the Crazy Iori clones a certain number of times during the event to get Crazy Iori[Frag].
events.name: Team Battle to get Crazy Iori.

events.description: During the event, Elite Campaign chances+3, go challenge and get the fighter fragment you need now!
events.name: Elite Campaign Chances+3.

events.description: Badge and Badge material can be exchanged for one another during the event, please take note that each badge can only be exchanged once, choose carefully!
events.name: Badge Exchange.

events.description: What are you waiting for, come challenge it now, be the first to get 2048!
events.name: 2048 Challenge.

events.description: EXP Rush Challenge chance+2 during the event! Come challenge EXP Rush Challenge stages!
events.name: EXP Rush Challenge Chance+2.

events.description: Rare fashion for Superstar Athena is available during the event.
events.name: Fashion Pack.

events.description: 1 of 2 Lucky Draw is coming! Superstar Athena and Rising Dragon Kensou are waiting for you! Don't miss out!
events.name: 1 of 2 Lucky Draw.

events.description: Use Egg Machine during the event, and there is a chance for you to get Superstar Athena and Rising Dragon Kensou Awaken Weapon Frag, Tome, Badge and other rare items.
events.name: Weapons Egg Machine.

events.description: Draw a certain number of times in Lucky Draw during the event to get rich rare items!
events.name: Lucky Draw Rewards.

events.description: Spend Diamonds to a specified amount during the event and get awesome rewards!
events.name: Spend for Rewards.
